Scripts

The Scripts class manages methods and properties related to TJS2. You cannot create objects from this class.

Members

Constructor
None
Methods
compileStorage ( Compile script on storage )
dump ( Dump context )
eval ( Evaluate expression )
evalStorage ( Evaluate expression on storage )
exec ( Execute script )
execStorage ( Execute script on storage )
getClassNames ( Get class names )
getTraceString ( Get call stack trace )
setCallMissing ( Register handler called when member is not found )
Properties
textEncoding ( Specify text encoding used when loading scripts )
Events
None
